items.title: ‘Fear The Walking Dead’ Star Cast As The Cowardly Lion In ‘Wicked’ Sequel
items.description: Colman Domingo will play the Cowardly Lion in 'Wicked: For Good' which releases in theaters this November.

items.title: The Looming Infrastructure Issues That Could Doom ChatGPT’s Atlas
items.description: ChatGPT's browser looks great — but bad legacy data and connectivity issues could doom it and others before they even reach the mass market.

items.title: Has ChatGPT Atlas Just Turned The Internet Into A Classroom?
items.description: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Atlas browser brings AI into everyday browsing. Could this help students and educators ask, explore, and understand in real time?

items.title: OpenAI’s Secret Financial Project
items.description: Plus: Lonely seniors are turning to AI.

items.title: AI And Video Will Fuel 1.1 Billion Creators By 2032, Report Forecasts
items.description: AI and video are reshaping media as creators become studios and brands act like creators, driving the creator economy to 1.1 billion people by 2032.
